thread.title: FIR held up against Ranveer and Sanjay Leela Bhansali
thread.title_full: FIR held up against Ranveer and Sanjay Leela Bhansali

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: FIR held up against Ranveer and Sanjay Leela Bhansali
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 18 (CINEWS): As per a report on Indiatoday.in, a FIR was recorded against on-screen character Ranveer Singh and chief Sanjay Leela Bhansali by a legal counselor in Pune on October 16, 2015. 
In his complaint, the lawyer asserted that he was mistreated and pushed by bouncers when he attempted to raise a complaint over the shooting of forthcoming film Bajirao Mastani. Wajid Khan, the complainant, said he was ambushed by bouncers when raised a complaint over the film’s shooting, which, as indicated by him was being done without legitimate authorizations from the concerned powers. Coordinated by Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Bajirao Mastani is slated for a release in December this year. The film stars Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone and Priyanka Chopra in lead parts.. Related Posts
